resources.string: A fiókod nincs megjelölve vagy korlátozva. Minden rendben!

string.name: engineMarked
string.comment:
This denotes that the player's account is marked for cheating, specifically for using external assistance.
Please note that while the key is 'engineMarked', Lichess has a wider definition of what constitutes 'external assistance'. External assistance is usually relying on a chess engine, but it can also mean looking through opening lines, taking advice from a strong player, and more.

resources.string: A fiókodat megjelöltük játszmák közbeni külső segítség használata miatt.
